definitions: openly or formally asserted or announced

examples.text: despite the company's declared good intentions, some remained skeptical
he has no declared conflict of interest
there is only one declared winner

shortDefinitions: openly or formally asserted or announced

definitions: (of taxable income or dutiable goods) acknowledged as being in one's possession

examples.text: declared goods are free from VAT

shortDefinitions: acknowledged as being in one's possession
